attributes.action: Change the motto of Lord Williams's School, Thame to 'It's a trippy environment'
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The momentous salvia trip of Samuel Davison (or Sammy D) is one that has touched many lives, and become a Youtube phenomenon. In recognition of Sammy's roots, we petition the above, in hope that the prime minister will sit down, just chill, possibly hoot a small chong and approve our proposal. Thankyou.

reasons: Intended to be humorous, or has no point about government policy
